text:
Five months later and fans can finally put a face to the latest additions to the Carter family! According to sources, earlier today Beyonce and Jay-Z’s twins, Rumi and Sir Carter, were spotted for the first time on a family vacation in Miami with their parents and big sister, Blue Ivy.

Of course some of Beyonce’s biggest fan sites were the first to share the photos on social media:

https://www.instagram.com/p/BbX3s-ugg36/?tagged=beyonce

https://www.instagram.com/p/BbX3gpYhU_s/?taken-by=formation.tour.2016

https://www.instagram.com/p/BbX3Xm0hWNJ/?taken-by=formation.tour.2016

So cute! The twins’ name hold a special meaning to Bey and Jay, as you can read here.
title: Beyonce and Jay-Z's Twins Rumi and Sir Carter Make Their 5 Month Photo Debut!
